gameIntro.title: About the Game
gameIntro.description: A new RPG experience themed on politics and strategy. Your choices drive the story.

character1.name: Diplomat
character1.description: Raised in a family of career politicians and foreign attachés, the Diplomat spent years working in embassies and international courts. Known for brokering peace between rival unions and leading panels at the UN, they've built their career on compromise, charm, and global prestige. Now they're stepping into domestic politics, promising to bring "international standards" to national governance — and to avoid conflict at all cost.

finalNote.message2: Whether it's impressions or improvement suggestions, your words will drive the next update.
